lines.text: So wait wait wait, the last time you saw runes like this, you lost the carpet. How did you lose the carpet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, so, did we never talk about that? Yeah. A bunch of us were riding it-- Ah, it was the dwarf, I swear it was the dwarf. We were on the carpet and there were runes on the walls and as soon as we got near the runes the carpet went (raspberry noise) and fell down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it might disenchant whatever we have on us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it could do that, it could also-- I don't know anything about magic, but I assume it could burn us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, how do we make it not burn us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well. (sighs) I mean. Hey, Shorty, you're our best bet here, I don't know anything about this shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who can undo magical thingies?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not me, Pikey! Pike? Pike, you got any undo magicky things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be a Dispel Magic spell, for the record.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I have Dispel Magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have it prepared?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then yeah, you could give it a shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're my girl!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could try my Dispel Magic ability.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's that one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's called a bullet. I'll shoot it until it doesn't work anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to cast Dispel Magic on it, I need you to go ahead and roll a d20 and add your spellcasting ability modifier, which--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! Oh, what is it, what was it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a 20 on the floor!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If it was bad it doesn't count, but if it's good it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That doesn't count. Roll it intentionally.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good, because it's not that good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, your wisdom modifier is actually a five, because she forgot to add her level 12 bonus we discovered recently. So it's now a 20, plus five on the roll. So go ahead and roll a d20, add five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. As you reach up and grab your symbol of Sarenrae, you focus for a second and there is a flash, like a flashbulb. As it flashes, the glyph glows for a second, and then you hear what sounds like a cracking sound. And this glowing energy seems to shatter, almost like glass made of energy. As the energy fades and falls out of the glyph, it hits the ground and it dissipates into a light mist that then vanishes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it's dispelled?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good job, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks, Vax.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going up, right? Up or down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There were stairs, there was no up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't want to go up, there's no up. Up is ouchie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we could skip over that one step and then there was up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stairs from underneath go all the way up to underneath the point, you haven't attempted to go over if you wanted to, it's up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah, we can jump over that little gap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I thought you said it went to the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, the stair illusion is the entire staircase. But you haven't-- you don't see what's on the actual landing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got the fancy broom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got the fancy broom, exactly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm, all right, I get on the broom and I float on up to that landing and I look and see if there's any traps on the ground. Without setting foot on it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've seen you take other people, can I hang off the bottom of that thing? Can you carry me up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, you're pretty heavy. You might fit--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm lighter than you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) It's nothing to brag about, scrawny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at my constitution, it's very low.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're learning so much tonight! God!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dangle well onto the bottom, you can hang off the bottom of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys were born at the same time, you're both scrawny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. I second this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. You get onto the broom, bring yourself to rise up, speaking the keyword, which is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (spitting sound)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to drift up, Vax, you go ahead and grab onto it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is stupid!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your weight is lifted by the broom, your feet actually fall through the illusion itself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't. Fucking. Let go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys watch as the lower half of his body vanishes against the stairs as he passes through it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (grunts) I'm checking for traps!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why is Vax holding on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're working things out, just let it happen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a family thing, please keep out! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dark up here, you see there are two rooms. Both doors are open. The one to the right appears to be some sort of a desk, study, bookshelves, but all the books are gone. The desk appears to be cleaned out. Actually, all the drawers are open and there are a couple of haphazard writing utensils that have dropped on the floor, but it looks like Quall was trying to leave in a hurry, grabbed most of what was important to him. Except for one thing, which is what he sent you here to get.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to be like: look for the circlet!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a reminder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one appears to be a bedroom, there appears to be a garish canopy bed with like spiral edges, with like little gold-leaf imprints into it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Traps, traps, under the bed. I want to look under the bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Under the bed, in the bed, around the bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This room does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look under the bed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look under the bed. Under the bed there is a small chest that is pushed to the very back, you pull it out, shhk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I check for traps on the chest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take three steps back away from my sister.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've made her very cautious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I, as it tends to. Go ahead and make an investigation check now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. The chest does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is locked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's locked, it's locked, open it. Open it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're so good at all my tricks, are you sure?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to try to pick this lock? Because I am very talented as a rogue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are extremely talented and you're going to get better and better every day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well then fine, I'll try to unlock it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you go ahead and take out your lockpick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this how you hold it? This is how you hold it, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey man, I don't want to harsh your mellow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a d20, add your dex and your proficiency bonus, you're proficient in the tools.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 24. 24. Is that saving throws or regular? Okay, yeah, 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (click) The lock is open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, look at that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good job, that's a good job.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. All the gold, all the gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Open it. There's a handful of copper. Looks like the other thing that was within this chest was also taken by Quall on his way out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh. Why would he take the shit out and then lock it and put it back under the bed? What a douche.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And aside from traps, is there any like, paintings with eyeholes cut in it for peeking or little holes in the wall?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check the chest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check the chest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it have a false bottom? The chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: C'mon, don't leave me hanging, what the hell!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You lift it up and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've always got to check it for a false bottom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, I did, I checked!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You didn't say shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was saying it, I said I'm checking all around the fucking chest, that's what I said!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hmmm, I didn't hear the words 'false bottom' out loud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the bottom of this you see a key. A single brass-colored key.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a key.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right, you're smart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? We're going to get downstairs and this key is going to unlock the thing that has the circlet, I know it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you're right. You know what else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't need to argue like this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why're you always busting my balls, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because it's fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sure it is, but y'know, getting hit in the nuts hurts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Double-check the bedroom for safes or things behind paintings or maybe some sort of carpet--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, who's talking, who is this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it, though? Is it really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, I'm just as depressed that it is as you are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I double-check the room for-- What would you like me to look for again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check paintings, behind the paintings, check the bed for any odd slidey bits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy is a paranoid rich person, so he knows things about them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trust paranoid rich people to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a general investigation check throughout the room as you search for any nooks and crannies, hidden spaces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, investigation again? 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You come to the conclusion that there is nothing else to find in this room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing else to find, I found the key, dammit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The room appears to be for the most part cleaned out from your discovery here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was more than one room though, right? You said--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we checked all the rooms. We checked the other room already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You checked the bedroom, now you looked within the office study with a desk and all the drawers were left open and things have already been taken from the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, let's take that key downstairs. As you said.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hop on the broom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to sit behind you, I'll hang from it again. It's gross.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can sit sidesaddle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glide your way down, back to the main floor. You guys are now at the top of the stairs leading into the basement, what're you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go down to the basement!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, I like this plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. I'll go a little ways ahead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Look, Percy, I found a key!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Checking for traps. Past-- I'll go up to the sigil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, shite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you just do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know but I will have a high-- 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just always have to be alert, you never know, sometimes you think you know but you don't actually know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There was nothing there, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The PTSD is really starting to sink in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three-point landing! Okay, we're fine!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they were up there dicking around, we were looking around at the middle floor, anything good?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we were not going anywhere near the pressure points, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that is without being said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, other than the rooms you guys went into, there was the dining room area and the kitchen area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything good that looks--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation checks from both you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Are you letting them wander and you're staying where you are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not going with them. No way, there are terrible bombs and stuff there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, Keyleth, you wander through the dining area towards the kitchen--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Being very gentle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you scope around the other side, checking around elements--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not touching anything, just looking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Nothing catches your attention specifically. You get to the kitchen, the kitchen is cold, layer of dust. Doesn't appear to be anything of particular interest in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hm. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Downstairs it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what, appreciate your rogues is all I'm saying, am I right or am I right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. You guys who wish to head down into the basement--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're still staying outside?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, actually, can Trinket and I walk to the other side of the street?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's in my locket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I walk to the other side of the street?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But do you want Trinket with you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you walk to the other side of the street on your own.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and I watch the house from across the street.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stakeout.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, since this is taking a bit, it's not a short rest is it, if I'm chilling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, if you sit for like up to half an hour or an hour rest, then yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah, I'm just watching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, you guys make it down to the basement area. This is a very, very small room, 20 by 20 feet, and there is a door, a big heavy-ass metallic door that has--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --a keyhole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A very specific keyhole, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait wait wait wait-- Yes, yes we will, but hold on, can I have a look at it? Can you have a look at it? We'll just take a look. And then you do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, look, they're doing it together.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's adorable, isn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shut up back there! It's easy to make mistakes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is some sort of an enchantment on the door, and the keyhole area itself. You can't ascertain the nature of it, but as you approach you can see that the metallic sheen shimmers without the light changing. There is something about it that is unnatural.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Hey, Pike. Do you think you can try dispelling magic again? Because there's some shimmery sort of shit on this door and I don't trust it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it's really pretty, but lemme give it a try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's iridescent!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's leave it, it's so pretty!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait wait wait. Before you dispel the magic--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it's good, maybe that's how the key works? If you dispel the magic, maybe the key won't work anymore, I don't know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, that key was hidden for a reason.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there magic on the key?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I stick it in and I turn it and it explodes and I die, oh, I don't know, that's never happened before--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, dispel the magic, yeah, no that's good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I might need some extra help because I only got a ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I inspire her retroactively?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you mark off your second third-level spell, releasing the Dispel Magic, the shimmer intensifies for a moment on the door and then returns to its natural state.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it worked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have anybody who has Telekinesis? Telekinesis of any kind?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Telekinesis? No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I can have, I can have someone--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, your invisible servant!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can have someone turn the key, if that's what we're talking about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, go do that!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make someone expendable, it's a brilliant idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's all step back, step way back. Back it up, back it up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait wait wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if it explodes the lock and then we're not able to get in at all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then waah, we go kill a dragon instead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well. Sort of, yeah yeah yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then at dawn, we talk about things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At dawn, we discuss!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We plan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At dawn!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I already had my great moment, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what're you doing, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can Unseen Servant carry a key, or is it more Mage Hand-y?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, a key's not-- Mage Hand can even do five pounds on its own.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do Unseen Servant, named Mort.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Mort.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The key drifts over, finds, turns, enters the keyhole. Turns to the side. The metal around the keyhole begins to glow brighter and brighter and brighter for a second. The outer rim of the door itself begins to glow accordingly, like the actual frame of the metal door begins to go from this dull, dull old iron look to this almost red to orange to white-hot vision and then fades to darkness, and the door (creaking).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would've burned us!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, maybe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not us, not us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Doesn't matter. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stepping into the room, you do see that this is a chamber familiar to you. You actually had a room similar to this in your keep. This is, specifically, an arcane sanctuary. This is used for the construction and the enchantment and the development of various arcane items. Similar to-- you've seen the chamber before at Gilmore's, although on smaller scale. This has seen various types of use. There's an alchemical setup in one corner, untouched.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you and your light-footed friend like to join me in here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'll come.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Mort. Join me.

lines.text: Mort has joined you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to touch anything in here. I don't see any traps--

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have at it. And I back up.

lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The architecture catches your attention.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ahh, it's beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And what did you say you were going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Setup, okay, there's various glass beakers--

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Oh, Elven? You're not able to read the actual label.

lines.text: What other languages do you know?

lines.name: TALIESIN

There are a few that the design on the label shows toxicity. You see there are iron filings, all these things that are used in various-- You have the brew potion ability, correct?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? You look around the room. You don't see a circlet, but what you do notice in the far end of the room is a 12-foot-tall humanoid structure built of solid stone that stands there looming across the way. Giant piston-like stone arms, tree trunk-like legs. You've encountered something like this before--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. That looks very similar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With Grog's dead dad.

lines.text: All right. As you approach the giant stone entity, pulling the rope out, you can see, embedded in the chest, there's a little slit, a very, very tiny slit in its stone chest. You see a faint blue sparking glow, the very same color of the cortex that you had recovered from the druid barrows when you were originally hired by Drez Vina to recover it. As you see this and you approach, it doesn't seem to react.

lines.text: Okay. You guys bring the rope around and you tie it pretty taut around the legs, which are pretty close together. They're not like in a wide aggressive stance. It's standing there inert. You wrap the rope around it multiple times, give it the best knots that you have.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance through this little slit and it's about that wide, like you can barely see the flicker, and the stone is about a good foot and a half, two feet deep before you even see the source of the light. It's a very, very thin slit to it, and from what little bit you can see, you see the gem is embedded in there with multiple metallic and stone things keeping it suspended there.

lines.text: Okay.

lines.text: Okay. Pull it out, hold it aloft, it begins to glow a little bit and react. The golem's chest glows a little bit and reacts. In a far distant corner, underneath the alchemical table, in a pile of some pieces of wood and crumpled stone, there's a slight dull glow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I walk over and I start brushing it away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you pull it away. You find an almost full loop of metal.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it is, actually.

lines.text: Okay.

lines.text: No, nothing. What're you doing?

lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: So, you feel there is a connection trying to be made, but you would need time to attune to this, should you want to take the time to do so. 30 minutes to an hour, depending.

lines.text: I want to stay here and see. You guys continue looking around. I'm going to meditate for a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, much time goes by. 20, 30 minutes. Not a peep. Silence.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You do notice on the far end of the street there does appear to be a pair of individuals that are leaned against a building, looking right at you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you sit down, your hands still inside the gauntlets, and take a moment to find the connection. You feel this rush of adrenaline hit your body as your hands seem to go numb for a moment, and in a flash your eyes see the chaos of the elements, of the creation of planets slamming into flames and earth, this instant vision of the very force of creation, a time before civilization, and you feel that fiery wrath all of a sudden burn through your fingertips. The vision ends and you look down, and as you curl your fingers, strength pulses through your body that you haven't understood in a while. As you're coming over that moment, the bloodaxe solidifies in your grip, and you can see where this rush could definitely send Kevdak's head to get a little big.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you take the time and eventually the connection finds its way and there's a clarity, and you, as it hits you at the end of this restful period in the basement, you open your eyes and you feel-- it's hard to describe, a bit of coldness in your head that's off to the right side of your head. It's this slight tickle of cold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's no fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Yeah yeah yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at the golem, and I say, step forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly, the eyes, which were dark, flare with bright blue light, matching his chest--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, oh wait, his legs are tied up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --and as he does, fwoomp, boom! Face-down onto the ground, the rope coming taut, it slams into the floor. You hear this loud impact beneath the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're okay, we're okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I swivel out a dagger and cut right below the knot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He looked like a moron. That was amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I go, sorry! Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No response. It's still face-down on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm on the ground laughing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I go, rise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait wait, one second, one second! We tied it around a lot of times. Hold on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're trying to cut the rope free, it starts standing up. You finally pull away as its foot backs up and almost crushes you. As it rights itself and stands before you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at that mustache.

lines.text: It has a majestic, black mustache across its face, its glowing arcane-driven eye sockets and its pulsing blue energy source in its chest, stands looking down at you intently.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go diving to see if there's an instruction manual somewhere in this room. I'm on my hands and knees going through the papers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at the rest of them and I go, holy shit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Make him wave!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I say, your manners. Wave to Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Keyleth, that's awesome!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I say, and a curtsey for Vex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, come on, don't demean him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the coolest!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can it do a double-bird?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I say, what do we say to those who we have just vanquished?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns to Vax. Big ol' stony middle fingers about that wide around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I look at him and I say, never forget that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't have a mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has my mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 21. What I rolled.

lines.text: As you guys are scanning around the floor, no sign of any sort of instruction manual, the way that things have been pulled out of here, and the way the circlet was found, you get the feeling as you look about this place that in the escape, Quall was grabbing and Drez Vina were grabbing everything they could, and didn't realize until they had left that the circlet had fallen from their grasp and been left behind. Anything else they probably have that is pertaining to this experiment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we have a killing machine now.

lines.text: How do we get him out?

lines.text: That's what I was just thinking.

lines.text: Okay, yeah, I pop Trinket out. It says a creature no more than large in size.

lines.text: Ahh, dammit.

lines.text: Wait! Oh no, he's not a creature. I can't make him invisible.

lines.text: I mean, he is a creature. Just the particular enchantment based on this, you get the sense that as part of the realm of the Raven Queen is the living and the dead, and this is not necessarily a living creature, it's a construct and the magic does not have an effect on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Any magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could try to make him invisible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It says creature.

lines.text: Scanlan, do you have a circlet right now? You had the Ioun stones. Do you have anything on your head?

lines.text: Well, my circlet, I'm a bit attached to it and it's very nice and has a lot of benefits to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So if we're going to go to the trouble of taking this thing out of here, one of us has to use it. What about your Pom-pom, or-- what did you call him?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Pop-Pop? Pop-Pop could do it, but I don't know if he would be very--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can wield. I can use him. Honestly, Fassbender might be something that we use sometimes and not all the time anyway. Maybe?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could we get him into the Bag of Holding?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I doubt it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Has to fit through the opening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. We don't have a big enough Bag of Holding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, I have an invention idea. Could you build a little gnome chair for either Scanlan or Pike or Wilhand on the back of it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I think he moves rather slow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, it would be so Mad Max. It would be beyond Thunderdome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't get that reference, but I think you feel me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How fast can he run?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, let's try it, I guess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps let's try this somewhere that is not a basement filled with chemicals.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can try this in the mansion. If we can get him through the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's make him invisible and get him to the mansion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll try to turn him invisible. I don't think it'll work, though, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast the spell for a second, using your bardic flair you wink and reach out and touch the golem, and the golem's form vanishes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, that's great, all right, let's get outta here then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You tell it to follow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's see how this works. Follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (stomping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he's rather loud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit. Hey, Vex? Do you have a Pass Without a Trace handy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me see how many spells I have left. I think I do. Yeah, I can do Pass Without a Trace, I have a couple left.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I couldn't possibly use my Glove of Storing, could I? To hold his hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try. You know from your experience that the Glove of Storing is usually for handheld objects.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Pass Without a Trace on all of us, including the golem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to tell the golem to walk quietly and stealth. Or attempt to, as best as he can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (stomping) You guys make your way up the stairs. As you make it up towards the top of the stair landing, you hear the crashing of wood behind you as the golem begins making its way up the staircase, destroying it in the process.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (stammering) What? Why is it? No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's wider than the stairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why is it going up the staircase?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because we're going up the staircase!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're going, oh. I thought we were outside the front door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The thing goes (impact). And stops in the middle of the air, before a couple smoke sparks go (sparks).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This thing is awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another one. (impacts)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like Quall didn't really think this through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you still unclear about whether we should kill this dragon or not? We have a killing machine now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it fly?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't matter. He can catch it with his hand!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. He actually might be able to hold onto it. At least for a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dragon's like 30 to 40.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So the dragon could probably like fly away with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The dragon would find him a very uncomfortable horse pill to swallow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: However, him plus a bunch of other people could probably hold the dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's get back to the mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, can he get through the mansion door?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will tell him delicately to kneel and crawl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it's a magic door. Scanlan, can you just make the door a little bigger to fit him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we have him smash through it? Who cares? We don't live here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're talking about your mansion door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all look at Grog across the street, sitting, clutching the bloodaxe, almost in a lotus position, looking at it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey buddy, whatcha doing over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys glance up and see Grog smiling, as suddenly behind them, (crashing), the doorway blows out and wood gets thrown out in the middle of the roadway, splintered ruin. There's a giant dome shape of the front of the house where brick and wood has been blown out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys, the door is exploding! Move! This way! I race across the street to them with the bloodaxe in my hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you get halfway across, pass them before

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fassbender, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't understand what you're telling me right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's invisible, but he's a giant stone golem!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reach out with my hand and try and touch whatever it was that smashed me in the face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach out and there's a very solid surface in front of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember, manners!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach up, as you're feeling out, all of a sudden, a giant form grasps you from behind and shakes your hand. Roll a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your arm gets torn off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, I lost a hitpoint when he flicked me in the nuts. Nothing? Nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A new strength check, right? 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. As this invisible hand meets, the strength is overwhelming, and then as you focus, you take over the handshake and force it to move your way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, you're stronger than the thing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are stronger than it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck is grabbing my hand?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fassbender. Scanlan named him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you keep saying that word. I don't know what it means.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll show you what he looks like in the mansion. I see you're wearing the gauntlets, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I've been wearing them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You've attuned to them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have a nice glow about you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have hair up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys make your way back towards the classic Trickfoot estate with the somewhat muted (stomping) behind you. The sun is just now starting to hit the sunset period of the day. The sky's going from a blue to a lighter white to an orange color, dusk is upon you shortly. And with that, we're going to take a bathroom break.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bathroom break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here shortly, guys, once again I want to say give some love to our Loot Crate sponsors if you can, at the very least go check it out and see what they got, go to www.lootcrate.com/criticalrole. Even if you're not interested in subscribing right now, go click on the link and let them know that Critters have some eyes and want to show them some love.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That Critters have power.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, guys, we'll see you back here in a few minutes.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Woo! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everyone. So! Back from break, Vox Machina made their way back to Wilhand's estate, the Trickfoots. For the sake of brevity, you did manage to get the Fassbender golem in through the ten-foot-tall door, five-foot-wide that leads into it. So it was able to barely squeeze in if you wanted to leave it there for the time being.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There it fits into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to try some stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to try?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, I'm tweeting out a link for Loot Crate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to go down to the training area where I normally sleep. Pike! Would you come with me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yup. I want to train, too. Sit-ups.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How big is the training area, can we all be in the training area practicing our skills?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, it's as big as he wants it to be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's have a group training session, you guys!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we learning skills? Group workout?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, before we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to go find my daughter. I've got to leave. Sorry. Bye. Bye!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're just leaving?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I got to go. Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just like that? We got to talk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want help?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I do. I'd like Vax to come.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, buddy, sure. Sure, yes, yeah. I'll see you guys later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll wait for you here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Talk, you can start the talk without me, it'll be fast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, you'll be right back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to throw in and say that I don't want to fight the dragon tomorrow, all right, let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do want to, and bye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Copy that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll train while you guys go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So where are you heading?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, wait. I run back to the door really quick. Kiki, c'mere c'mere c'mere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What what what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you do that mend-y thing still? This is her, Pom-pom? Pop-Pop, I dunno. Glue the head back on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pop-Pop's? Okay okay okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, glue the head back on. And then I chase after Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do the mending on the Sarenrae statue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And in doing so, you reaffirm the single-piece form that was the small shrine setup for the Sarenrae shrine in the home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I want to try a few tricks with the golem, but throwing that out there. Go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to that in a moment. Where are you going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to where I dropped her off at the sewers. And I'm hoping that he can track or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably should've brought a ranger with you, I'm really good at tracking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck! I don't know what you people can do! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outstanding!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, now as the sun is disappearing right behind the mountains and nighttime is coming, you lead Vax southward through Westruun, dodging around a few patrolling goliath Herd members, and eventually find your way to the alley where the entrance to the sewer, the protruding entrance existed where you left Dr. Dranzel and Kaylie and a number of survivors that were in the ruined Temple of Arathis.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, Vax. I know that you are an expert tracker. Right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pretty good, I've watched my sister do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you're not the one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know that my name is Vax, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know, aren't you the tracker guy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sort of?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, don't you move in the night and do things?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do have really good eyes, do you want me to have a look?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we go in the sewer and see if we can figure out where they went?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's have a look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They went down here and they went towards the city wall, that's all I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Dranzel closed it behind him, you go ahead and grab it. Make a strength check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I can't lift anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could we do it together, could I help him, give him advantage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say between the two of you pulling, Scanlan most of the weight, you manage to (strained sounds).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: C'mon, pull your weight, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pull the grate, it scrapes, and you manage to haul it off to the side. It's still a difficult process but you do manage enough strength in the two of you to pull it off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your forearms are like Popeye, motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes they are. Years of use.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stench of the sewer immediately hits your nose, there is a metal ladder that leads down into the subterranean area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Where do we go?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I-- well, let's see if she left any-- my sister looks for tracks. You really should've brought my sister. I'm going to check for tracks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a survival check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Survival check, okay, well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh wait no, is this for checking for traps or tracking?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tracks. Footprints.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that what you said?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said tracks, I'm not looking for traps, we're in the sewer. Tracks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Survival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: D'you need an article of her clothing for a scent?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 17. I'm concentrating on the mud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're down inside the sewer, there is a recess in the center of the floor where most of the various sludge runs through. There are bits of runoff from when the rain does pour through, and it rains fairly often here in this part of Tal'Dorei, where bits of mud and compost that get caught on the sides are. You do manage to find a few spots that appear like footsteps, you don't know who from, it appears some sort of humanoid's footsteps, over an area that heads southward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hold my foot over one, is it smaller than mine or is it about the same size?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one you see is about the same size.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There were some humanoids, humans with us. We were traveling with a bunch of people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah? Okay. Well, I mean, they would've washed away if they were old, so probably pretty new. Let's follow them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are the expert.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'll lead the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You continue, both of you guys make stealth checks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven. I'm just excited!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Going to see my daughter!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys continue finding your way, weaving through the southern area, following the tracks they vanish and you'll see a couple footprints here, and then you guys will lose the trail. The scent is terrifying and getting worse the further south you progress. You do head into one central chamber and both of you guys make perception checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh! 19!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both stop in as you immediately see in the center of this room a large bulbous form that is massed in the center. You both stop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Qu-iet. Quiet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm always quiet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not moving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, did you send your daughter down to get attacked by a giant bulbous shit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we go around it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true, there were like a bunch of slimes and stuff down there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're in a larger chamber and it's in the middle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's like a four-way, four different platforms or passages merge in the center here, where one of the drains leads down into--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And are there any of the footprints left anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you do see bits of sludge around, and there are a number of footprints that are all scattered around, some smeared, some skidding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I reach down and I scoop Scanlan up in football pose again. Which way do you want to go? I can't tell which way. Your daughter. Reach deep, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I sense which direction the wall of city is, like do I have any sort of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Survival, I've never done this before! 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Keeping track of where you were and the direction, you gather it's probably that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I-- let's go that way!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Sorry, let's go that way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't. Move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a terrible swollen creature with tendrils, a mouth, it feeds on refuse and rot. This was a rather swollen and dangerous-looking one. However, as you pass by and look, you see a series of wounds across its body and its lifeblood dripping out. This one has been slain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to set you down, all right? I think your daughter done killed a-- oogedyboogedy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? How do you know that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sit down. It's dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Oh, good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Survival check again. You followed the tracks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any track marks?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12. I already asked that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tracks vanish, you're not sure how to follow a direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any blood or ooze walking away, I mean dripping away from there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it all congeals in this general area, most of the central room, the middle area is very clustered with slime and goop. There's no natural flow and there hasn't been a very recent rainfall so there isn't a fresh flow of water through here either.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And where were they going, where did you tell them to go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Out of town, get out of town.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I know where that is, which direction that is down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a large ten-foot-tall circular grate. If you look, the bars are actually bent open and it leads outward, the liquid from the sewage now spills out into this small ravine in the very southern portion of Westruun. And leads out into--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sort of like this? Or is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's up like this, it's vertical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vertical. And what do we see past the bars?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the open plains south of Westruun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No sign of tracks, anyone huddled for safety?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, looking around you can see a few footprints, scattered footprints, you can make a survival check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pff. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? Nothing that specifically catches your attention.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think she got outta here, pal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Balls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But she's not here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's better off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. All right. Sorry, wild goose chase.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, don't worry about it. You want to talk about it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no. I just don't know when I'll see her again, so. I'll find her again. That's all. It'll be good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I believe that, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, and hey. Thank you. Back at the sphinx. Your sister was unconscious, and you dove in to save me. That was very nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I knew she would be taken care of, and I wasn't sure about you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because you love me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're very entertaining and I would be sad to see you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I owe you one. Forever. And I hate to say it, but I feel terrible about it, but I think I might've killed a couple of civilians because I feel like I owe you some, some help.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I was in the big fight back there, I could've hurt you or the civilians, but I decided to hurt the civilians, because I've got to protect you, because you protected me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well-- there's no right or wrong, but next time, I'll be all right. You help people more in need than me, and I'll be all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Next time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know any of your fancy, you know, fluh-duh-duh. But--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is no ranger like me. This is stupid, we should go back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Through the sewers again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, we don't have Big Man with us and I don't want to run into any of his third cousins or whatever, so yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll lead the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Might as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually you guys make your way back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not going to make them roll survival to get back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys are lost forever in the sewers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Little roundabout, but they get there eventually, they return to the mansion--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Never to get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Smelling awful. All right, so. You wanted to go ahead and do some exercises with Fassbender.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do want to do some exercises with Fassbender.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Who doesn't?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who doesn't want to do exercises with Fassbender? Abs of stone, that Fassbender.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: P90X with Fassbender? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, he's not invisible anymore, right? You dropped that, I'm assuming he dropped-- sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's faded by now, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He is huge. Fuck. Now I get it, all right, he's with us. Got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He is with us, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Understand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fassbender, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: His name is Fassbender?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I call him Fluffy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fluffy it is!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm terrible at naming things, I just go with whatever the first person shouts out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lie because I said Spike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She goes with the second thing that everybody shouts out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Too late now. It's in stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Literally.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like an improv show. "Salty McFucknuts!" (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spike, ehhh, not that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It basically is, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so first I say, Fassbender, run! And I want to see how fast he can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he runs about the same speed you do, I mean as far as its bigger steps, but it gets about the same distance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, and I say, Fassbender, punch Grog! He's used to this, Grog's fine with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you do anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, yeah, I totally take it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is how we train with Grog. It's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're healed, you're healed up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The golem pulls back, whoosh, swings at you with a giant fist. That is a 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that-- wait. Well, I took off-- yeah, I did take off my Bracers of Defense, so that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Whack. Right square to the side of the face and jaw, you take, from the impact of its giant battering-ram-like arm, 24 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not raging, so it's not halved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Tit for tat, bitch. And I swing back with the Titanstone Knuckles and punch Fassbender in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we know if we can heal him once we damage him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll find out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. So you do one plus the plus seven strength damage to it. So eight points of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of the four or the six, because it's my fist?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So eight points of damage from the crack as the fist hits. It does cause like a crack where the impact hits, a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say, okay, all right, enough hitting each other, enough of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, hold on, we were just getting warmed up, I mean, this is where the game starts, you know, it's like, P-I-N-G and then you really start playing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ping? You can--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a song.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's some other questions first, other questions first. I cast Call Lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get in the way of this, just for fun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Indoors, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I just, it's fine, I bring down a bolt of lightning on a dummy, and then see if I can also command Fassbender to punch a dummy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Bolt of lightning hits a dummy, the dummy is shattered. As you command Fassbender, Fassbender leaps forward at another dummy, whoosh, giant haymaker and causes the dummy to explode into a bunch of fluff and cloth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So would we say that would be like a bonus action, what I just did?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No? It was an action for each?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you have to focus on it, yeah. I mean, you can give it-- you have an action to give it a command, and it'll continue the command as it goes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So once it's set in that motion, it'll continue to kill that thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. So then theoretically I can have a concentration spell up and be like, kill that thing, and they won't overlap?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm, let's see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey now. Rangers aren't very strong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, yes, I did punch him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to check by the way, Liam, are you imagining the eighties-era X-Men danger room right now too, with like the hoops and the bars.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ohh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, metal rods, and Nightcrawler going--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes an action to focus and give it a new command.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A new command.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Once it is commanded, it will continue to do it until told otherwise or it completes whatever task it was given.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not a concentration to keep up that command. So, like-- keep fighting the dragon until it hits the ground would theoretically be one command that would keep going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on your experience with it so far, theoretically it should work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (robotic voice) Whatever Keyleth wants, Keyleth gets.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Speak and Spell. We found out if it can talk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ask a question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fassbender. How many years old are you? Hold up-- hold on, how old are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No response.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, this is good, we're finding out its intelligence level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you gesture to me with your fingers and tell me how many years old you are? (whispers) I don't think he's listening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It may not be smart enough to know that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's distracted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there, it's-- no response.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it doesn't know anything, that's good. Let's find out if it can, does it have any magical properties beyond punching, can it, tell it to use magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Death's eye.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then I die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disintegrate beam, straight on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then you dye a blue streak in your hair and everything goes fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It turns over, brings its hands up like this-- make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well look, I wanted a live test subject.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no, I'm with you, I'm with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my designation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural. One.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You feel like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey! To Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No no no, it's happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've been near explosions before, not like super close but big enough where you feel like the concussive wave from a distance, not enough to harm you, but enough to like, send you off your balance for a moment. You feel that impact, and as you fall onto your back foot, time around you seems to be moving faster that you'd expect, and (slow-mo voice) you find your motion sluggish.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. That's Slow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slow-mo voice) And you really have a hard time really moving--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's awesome!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (slow-mo voice) This-- put--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's-- you're in slow-mo!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (slow-mo voice) --the candle--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, you're in slow-mo! You're slow-mo, Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (slow-mo voice) --back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's amazing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we fix him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll wear off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How will he do zingers now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wisdom, where are we-- 16.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (slow-mo voice) We're slow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slow-mo voice) Not really changing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, Fassbender, can you drop this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bet he can't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You asked him a question as opposed to telling him to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fassbender, drop the spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (normal voice) He stands there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll wear off. Okay. Fassbender, do you know any other spells, and if so, cast them at the dummy this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks at the dummy, looks back at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, before I do that, can I do a level one Cure Wounds to see if I can heal him first? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I roll a d20 for it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's talking to a whale right now somewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (slow-mo) hate-- you-- (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell us all about the nature of politics.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just think, the fun thing is, I think you're aging much slower than the rest of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This is, this, hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) This is the most torturous thing ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go ahead and reach out and touch it, and the healing magic seeps up into the crack that Grog left behind, and the crack fuses shut.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's cool, that's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For how much was the total?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, fuses shut entirely, it's like there was no crack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So he gets healed by a heal--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a minute passes, and then you come back to your normal pace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's-- no, it's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How was that, how did that feel? Was it frustrating?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, that's all I need.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can it fly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh. Fassbender, can you-- I don't think he can fly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just try it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fassbender, can you fly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fly, Fassbender, fly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How high did it jump?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How high is it jumping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's getting six feet off the ground vertically. And then landing with a heavy impact each time, causing these divots to continuously push into the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I wonder if it can like earthquake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I Stone Shape, I take a chunk of the wall and I Stone Shape a boulder. And I hand it to him. And I say, throw it at that target.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiny little boulder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hits the target, the stone shatters across it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So his aim's pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take two points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ahh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unable to control its force.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm. Yeah. You're my buddy, Fassbender.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Out of idle curiosity, two last important things that I would recommend.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps, Fassbender, go into recharge mode? Or sleep mode? Perhaps? So that maybe it can regain some of its magic ability, which it might burn through? And two, and I'm surprised that I'm the one to mention this, but we should double-check to make sure that that thing isn't doing anything strange to your head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the record, while this has happened, Mort, who's been following you guys around because it's not concentration, the circlet that he was carrying, the one that you previously had, hit the ground. And is lying there on the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pick that up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. It's very nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. It's very old. Okay, Fassbender. Rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The eyes go to a very, very dull glow, its form tends to slightly hunch forward in the position it was at rest when you found it in the basement, seems to have gone into some sort of a rest state.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take that off for a bit? Maybe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I like it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try taking it off, Kiki.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's my friend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll be your friend in the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I take it off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shouting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am going to throw something at you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's like the fifth time today and it's so good!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You sneaky-sneaky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, like a good horror movie. Fakeouts.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: As you take it off your head--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --your eyes start to bleed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take it off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seems all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I look funny?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More than normal? Oh, no, you don't look different.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're a dick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. Well, you made a robot cast a spell on me. An automaton, I suppose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm, you earned it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, while this is happening-- you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I turn to Pike and say like, look at what I got!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: These are cool!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right? I don't even feel it. It's like nothing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You don't?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You don't even feel that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, nothing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, look. The bloodaxe, right, I've known this weapon for many, many years, and I wanted you to be here when I did this. (whispers) Can you hear me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did it say anything to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No response.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Which is cool, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, this is good, this is good, this is an improvement from your last weapon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, better. Can you tell if it's evil?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bad? Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How awful a person am I?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're pretty awful, from what I'm slowly beginning to learn about you, Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing? There's, the level, what spell do you have prepared that'll help with this, if any? That you have prepared.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where'd it go, where'd it go, it was right-- Can I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a level one spell, Detect Good and Evil, if you have that prepared, that would detect for an evil entity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have Identify?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Identify is more of an arcane-based.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be like Scanlan or any other arcane casters you would know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I perception check it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have Identify?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm asking you, not you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Insight check it, can I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll have to butter me up first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it's hard to insight check something that's not living from what you can tell. There's no communication, there's nothing, it just looks like an axe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll learn that spell and I'll check it later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you can't tell anything?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't tell anything right now. It looks pretty normal. And it's a good sign that it's not talking to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. So we're already in a better place than we were before.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. And they look really cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They do. Hey, wait, keep holding it for a second. Can I walk over to the wall? Can I punch the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to punch the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like our first game ever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (Grog voice) I'd like to punch the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait-- 50.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, that's damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, no, just damage is doubled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, just damage. 25. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stones tumble and hit the ground, a bunch of it, plaster and pieces fall and hit the area around you, causing a small pile of wreckage. Pretty solid punch.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I remember being little and Kevdak went and punched a boulder and it went like (stone shattering) and split in half.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoa, and you just did it with the hands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to be busting balls big time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I swing the axe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, at me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No! At the dummy. I'm going to try it. I'm going to try swinging the axe at the dummy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sticks into it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good swing! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not as strong as him per se, you're--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vicious, vicious. Oh wait--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your strength is 13, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your strength is 13, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength is 13, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not, because you haven't put the gauntlets on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't, I don't think I erased that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well hold on, I had to take the Gauntlets of Ogre Power off, do you want them back? Now, I think you have to give 'em up for the boots, but it's your pick, it's a kite-- or you can be a monstah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So your strength is back up to 19 with the Gauntlets of Ogre Power. Beefy Pike is back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I also have-- wait, is Scanlan back? (sniffs) Do I smell poo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this time has passed, you guys do return to the mansion, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ahh. I'll go down and check on things downstairs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a minor thing, on the walk back in the sewer I would like to slowly, just in case some of these assholes want to fight a dragon tomorrow, I slowly start attuning to acidic damage instead of fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a problem. You are currently resistant to acid damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Didn't I get these Bracers of Defense from you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe? I don't really remember things like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Do you want 'em back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bracers of Defense, what do they do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It gives you a plus two to your AC if you wear no armor and are using no shield.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wear armor, so I could trade them for something cool?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You wear armor?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wear Cold Snap Leather Armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anybody not wear any armor?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The only one who doesn't wear armor is you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Cool. Well, they're worth like six thousand gold, so I guess--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, fucking hand 'em over, we'll sell 'em for stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll hold onto them, thanks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, I don't trust your haggling skills, I promise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we can ever find a store open in a city that's not destroyed, we can sell this stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not much of an economy right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For 50! No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll have to make your way to another city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Back to the Clasp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So it's night, it's nighttime.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably figure out if we're going to fight a fucking dragon in the morning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We owe Zanror a talk one way or the other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, gods. We're going to go talk to him tonight? We need to sleep!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we need to heal up, big time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm pretty tapped out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big Man, what are we going to do in the morning when we get up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At dawn, we chit-chat!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: At dawn, we plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Treaties have been signed, and-- stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
