lines.text: I'll also, weren't we at some point supposed to check the library for clues of the location of the next Vestige?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What library? Here, the Cobalt Reserve?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and we still haven't found Reginald's daughter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is a thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll send a carefully worded letter. We can't roam the city for days trying-- looking for some dead guy's daughter, come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we don't have to, we know where she is. She's in the prison.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, she's in prison!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then we should go bust her out!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We may just be able to get them to release her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We might be able to do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It sounds like there were a lot of people in prison, last we heard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we can talk to them, but we have to talk to them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog has to talk to them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we sleep first? And go at dawn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if this can wait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long is a long rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A long rest is six to eight hours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six to eight. So on the short end, we could get up at three and walk over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wake his ass up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go sleep now, wake up, go let the prisoners free, and then talk to Kev-- Zanror.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, well, when are we going to talk amongst ourselves?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should do that now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Short, short talk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't feel comfortable fighting a dragon on 24 hours' notice after almost getting my arse handed to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, that's Percy's vote. Keyleth, what do you say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I pass and wait to hear other people's thoughts?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, Vax, what do you say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Much to my own chagrin, I'm in perfect agreement with Frederick von Whatsitface de Rolo de Whatsit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am-- I stand by what I said before, I think we should let them go out and fight a dragon, and we try to rescue the city while they are distracted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Badass Hand-Smasher the First?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's you, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's me. I'm having trouble. What are you thinking?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wouldn't care if we left now. I don't think we're ready. I think it would be foolish. I learned a lesson yesterday. And I'm anxious to die, don't get me wrong, but I'd rather win, if we planned a little better, than lose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any big trees in the city?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not a lot of people. We need to move a lot of people. How many people are in theory still left in the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An entire fucking city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, a lot of people have left and gone to Kymal, a lot have left and gone to the Foramere Basin, which you already saw. And a lot of people are still within the city, and currently being lorded over and run--or were-- by the Herd, you don't know quite how many still remain. You've seen many jump between homes, and a few that've waited for this whole thing to blow over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Triple digits, four digits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you're looking at maybe four digits, low four digits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Low four digits, that'll do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, we have this Herd. They will be our allies for exactly one day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In theory.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In theory. So if we do not use them to attack dragons, can we at least use them to do something? Because they will no longer ever be our allies again after today. We could use them to go try to kill the dragon on their own, we could use them to try to kill something or someone else for us, we could use them to try to help clear the city, if we convinced them that it was in their best interest to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll amend my proposition to this. I'm not sure what that word means.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 'This'?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. If we go and speak to Zanror, and we can't change his mind about fighting this dragon, which I'm not entirely comfortable asking him to do, we at least get the innocents, prisoners, and hostages out of the city. We pretend that we're going to fight the dragon with him, and when shit goes down, we wait.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's actually what I was thinking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not a bad plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have the means to bail us out very quickly if things go wrong.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I can tell you, this group ain't the best lot in the world, and they mean nothing to me compared to the people in this room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Conversely, you were a part of that lot once. And you came out of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Once. But are we trying to save a herd? Or are we trying to save a town?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we're trying to save the world at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's bigger than a town, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A little.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Today we can save a town.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, we're all gathered here together, so I'd like to take this opportunity with Wilhand's blessing to propose marriage to you, Pike Trickfoot. Will you make me the happiest gnome ever? I'm sorry, I couldn't contain myself any longer.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was so sudden!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, I'm sorry, I've been thinking about it all night tonight, I went looking for Kaylie, she wasn't there, and then-- I'm sorry, I blurted it out, it's just, we're all together, we're never all together like this, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I roll stealth and hide right now? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I roll stealth and hide right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try to if you want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 28, I'm gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scanlan, at least this could wait until after the danger's over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, I know, but we may die later tonight when we go see Zanror.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only if we follow your example.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the most impressive segue I've ever encountered.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was trying really hard here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was a segue if I've ever heard one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what, don't answer now, don't answer now. I know that you want to say yes, but please, don't answer yet. Just think about it and we'll talk about it some other time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because that's a lot--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's-- yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have any alore root? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You ever want a vision quest, just let me know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know what, I will think on it, and I will give you an answer after some dragons are killed and-- let me think on it, Scanlan. Let me think on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) I think that went well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you mean, like, permanent marriage?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I was really start-- yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no no, I'm sorry, that didn't, I didn't do that the way I had planned it in my head, I'm sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was overcome with a lot of stress, you know? We're fighting dragons and bonding with goliaths here and you're in my house, and it's a very very stressful night for me, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the weirdest coping mechanism I've ever heard of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. I'm sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay, maybe you just feel that way because we could all die, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You feel like you maybe-- I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what, we'll table it. We'll table it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll table it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll table it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Where is Wilhand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he's in the kitchen.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's probably made a delicious meal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should eat and then sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way to the kitchen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, let's finish this conversation over food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a-- what did you have in mind?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, we need to finish this conversation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's all-- if he had more stuff, he could really do well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't-- I don't think you're supposed to eat-- that's creative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Every chicken dish ever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll have the soup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wilhand is slumped in the corner on a stool with a bottle of wine that is mostly empty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (old-man voice) Try the chicken sorbet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A bit of drool dribbling down his neck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the bottle. He pulled it back! I let him have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go and whisper to Scanlan, are you all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm fine. She didn't say no?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She didn't. I sort of meant about Kaylie as well, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes. I just don't know where she is, so it's a bit stressful. That's all. She's safe though, right? Just say yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Of course she is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I thought so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go and grab a shitload of chicken and start shoving it in my mouth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Wilhand here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's passed out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's passed out in a corner with a bottle of white wine that's half-empty.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go get a blanket and cover him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I walk over and I slide the bottle of ale out of his hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Death grip on the bottle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I leave the bottle of ale and I take the statue of Sarenrae and I put it in his other hand, tuck him up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cuddles it up with the blanket around it, he's like this little bundle of old gnomish sleeping joy right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, buddy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is Vax here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. I wanted to put like shaving cream in his hand and tickle his nose with a feather.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shouldn't we all be present?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's left to finish?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Other than take a rest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If they won't delay, then we say, all right, let's go fight, and we send them into battle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we don't really fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we see how they do, and we try to rescue people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe it's time to split up. Maybe some of us help fight the dragons while others help evacuate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I'm not separating from you when we go fight a giant fucking dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may run to try and quietly by myself grab a few things from the library that we may need for the next Vestiges.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going tonight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah. Possibly in the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do recall based on your previous scrying spell--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was ruined and most of it had been picked clean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --it was ruined, a lot of it picked over, Allura was escaping with a couple of tomes under her arms before escaping via spark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, all right then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it doesn't mean that there's not something still potentially there, but I'm sure Allura got most of the good stuff. She's not stupid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's fair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can still check it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the plan?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We go to sleep--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't have a plan, but while they're all dicking about, after about an hour of staring at the wall, I start talking to the air, and say: you know, I've never put much stock in faith. And for the life of me, I question so much why my sister took that broom and I can't figure out another reason for her to have done it, other than fate, for I would not be standing here, nor would anyone else in my family. So. You weren't my first choice, but I'm over that. And I'm ready. I will come to you as soon as I am able. I don't know how any of this works. I'm coming. Whatever we need to do. I don't know what I believe, but I made a promise and I'm sticking to it and I'm coming to you. So just hang on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go to bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you get to your bed, you look down and a single black feather is currently set on the pillow before you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tuck it behind my ear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The rest of you going to sleep for the evening?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: As we're walking to sleep, I grab Scanlan real quick. I grabbed Scanlan real quick once everybody's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So, I have to tell you something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have to answer now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not an answer for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's fine, I was, it was, I was impetuous and silly and I don't know sometimes, I get hamhanded around you-- I'm very smooth with everybody else, I don't know what it is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's just that-- it's fine. It's okay. I have to confess something to you. When you gave me that letter--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When you told me not to read it until you died--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because curiosity gets the best of me sometimes, I can't-- it's not--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you can't, you're like a priest or something, you can't lie!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, but that-- what does that even mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, I--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go back and forth with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There was personal stuff in there!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, but what-- I know, it was very personal, and I just wanted to tell you that everything you said in that letter, I promise to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That I give you my word that everything you said in that letter I promise to you I will do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which I am hoping that you never do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we've almost died a few times very recently.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, and we've had so many close calls and I feel like I just needed to tell you so you had some comfort in your person, in your body, that you knew that if--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My body? What are you t-- you sound like me, you're stammering and babbling like I was!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, you do make me a little nervous and I'm not really sure why, and I need to reconcile these feelings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should just marry then!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I don't know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know either! It's a very strange relationship.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm so confused. Maybe we should just sleep together and see what happens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, fine. No, you said it! You said it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just kidding, I'm just kidding, it was just a joke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't joke about that stuff with me!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. I'm being careless, I think that drink that Wilhand gave me is settling, and it's-- moving about. Making me say things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't even know what's going on right now!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just kidding. I don't actually think we should sleep together. I just need to tell you that I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for clarifying?! (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Anyway, Scanlan, I love you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is not how I thought tonight was going to go! I feel betrayed, I feel let down, I feel so horny right now!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, you've grown those forearms for a reason, so just go take care of business.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, come on, Pike!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's some reincorporation right here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Callback!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen. Everything I said in that letter I meant. And regardless of whether or not you totally betrayed me by reading it, I'm glad that you at least understood the sentiment, I hope?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And appreciated my honesty and the fact that you are taking that vow? If I die.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, I am taking

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all I need.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. And I was trying to be funny and I didn't mean to be careless with your feelings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I know, I didn't know why I proposed, that's stupid.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do love you so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love you!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And a part of my heart does-- I do love somebody else very much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But my feelings are growing for you a little bit in a weird way and I'm not sure what it is, but we'll figure it out. I'm confused.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we both are? Anyway. Thank you for telling me the truth after you sort of lied to me, so--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I never told you I did not read it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --oh, I know, but all right. Anyway. Thank you for this-- sort of. I guess I have to go to my room and think about this while I stare at my picture in the mirror above my bed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which is-- what's your picture?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But, listen. I do love you, I will always love you, even in death, and thank you for telling me that and-- I hope it doesn't come to that, but if it does, that makes me feel a little bit better about things.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Well, I love you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sleep tight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I give him a hug and a kiss on his cheek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I kick the dirt a little bit and then I walk away and I click my heels. Little jump-and-click.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And-- anything else, before the evening's rest comes? All right. Sleep finds you all, some easier than others, until a measured period of time, I believe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog sprung awake, gathered the folks in the pre-dawn hour of the following morning. You gather your stuff, exit the mansion, and start making your way towards the Margrave's house.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anyone on the street?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19. Plus zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys exit Wilhand's place and there is a cross-street that Wilhand's home is nearby, that's like a building sandwiching it on each side, and the one just south of it is on the corner of that cross street. Across the way as you guys exit the room, or exit the front of the building, you see two figures stand up, arms crossed. The same individuals you saw earlier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of Wilhand's place?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Same people I saw outside of the house earlier. All right, fuck this shit. I turn and I walk towards those two people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're the same two people that were watching you while you guys were resting directly after the battle with Kevdak in the center of the square, the two that were assigned to keep an eye on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hello. What're your two names?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Funny, I feel like I've seen you about in the last few hours, watching us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keeping an eye out."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Huh. Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because you killed our leader. Takes a while to see what strength is a man who's killed "your leader. If he's a murderer. If he's an honor-bound man. Or if he's a piece of shit that "you should wipe off your heels."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Takes a bit of watching to get that. Jury's still out."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you have a new leader now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look at each other. "Maybe."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you like to walk with us? We're going for a little morning stroll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nothing else to do." And they wipe a little bit of sleep from one of the corner of the eye. "Lead on."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we head to the Margrave's house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put my old-school circlet back on, by the way, but I have the other circlet with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of which is a goliath keeping watch, to the right of him on the other side is a gruff-looking female human, humanoid, sitting there, arms crossed, watching as you guys approach.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I make eye contact with both of them. I seek an audience with Zanror.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's expecting you, get in."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys walk into the house, you see the interior of the Margrave's abode. Across the way there is a haphazard throne that's been built from lumber and carts and things that were pulled from resources within the town. You can see this is probably where Kevdak sat once they had taken the home, the estate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I grab my earpiece and very lightly say, Vax, keep your eyes about you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you all entering with Grog?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we leave a couple outside or anything or no?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, stay together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys all enter into the foyer area. The throne is across the way, there's a long hallway that leads to the back of the estate, and at the very back you can see the throne. There are some low sconces in the walls that give the flicker of light, in the center there is a round table which is currently set. There are some weapons and daggers, a few javelins tossed onto it, looks like some fruit that's partially eaten, and there on the table you see Zanror, already armored up, arms splayed across the side, looking down at the table, looking down at the weapons before him. Behind him, you see his wife, the lady, the other pregnant goliath that is currently behind rubbing his shoulders and talking to him into his ear. They both look up and see as you approach, at which point Zanror whispers to her for a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does he say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now's the day where we prepare."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aye, wouldn't miss it for the world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "First and foremost, Grog, take that shit off. It's really freaking out most of our people."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is pretty sweet, though, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's confusing, to say the least, aye?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We all have our preparations to make before battle. Don't worry about mine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To each their own, I suppose. Heh. You've fallen in some strange paths since we last met."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have no idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Rest of you, can we expect your attendance in this glorious fight?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wherever Grog goes, we go as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Good."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I suppose we could ask the same of your Herd, Leader Zanror.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So we stayed. He could not admit he was wrong. He abandoned reason and foresight. And I questioned "him, our actions here in the city. Our future. He beat me and threw me into chains. So learning from "the mistakes, here. When this dragon is done, we leave. We have no place in this city."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Might be smart to listen to reason in this instance as well. That dragon is ancient and very large. It's quite possible he'll wipe out all of us, the town included. It might be smart to swallow our pride for the day and prepare. Come back when we have preparations made and we can take the dragon down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please understand, the dragon has claimed quite the tithe from our people. We've provided "what we can, what we could scavenge, but even then the coffers of this town that we could acquire are "growing thin. The reason that we were preparing for this attack even before you arrived is because "we were at the end of our rope. Many of the people made away from this town with their goods before "we came, and many still have escaped our grasp when we took over. So the paltry sums that we "could gather in the time that we did hold reign over Westruun-- the dragon is not going to be "happy that each package dwindles with each passing couple of days. Either we take this element of "surprise and fight it on our own terms, or we wait for it to come to us angry, on its. And if we "leave now, the Herd may survive. But I haven't heard of a dragon that when crossed lets that "vengeance fly. And I'll be honest with you, we leave a trail behind us, as you know."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That I do. It is a wide wake, my friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you saying you're abandoning the Herd?" At which point you can see there's tension in his muscles, and you can see Tress currently reaching back for a weapon and Ivon, not breaking a sweat, leans into his face, square chiseled jaw going, "Yeah. I guess that's what I'm saying. Herd of "Storms is no more if you're going to lead us into death. We'd rather live on. Back to the lives we "had before you came in and mucked it up." "Close the doors!" Zanror says, and the door shuts behind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Zanror looks to you. "What do you say, Grog Strongjaw, slayer of Kevdak, he who raises might "against the dragon?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thunderlord, we back your play.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The rest of you, those who travel this world afar, outside of our people, where does your "allegiance lie?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, certainly not with the cowards who're abandoning you in the face of a tough fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who're you calling a coward, little man?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Watch where you turn your gaze. It may be the last movement your head makes attached to your body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's not good. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's still staring at Scanlan. (spits) Spits right in your face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not very nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. It's not. Neither is calling me a coward."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'm just a guest here, so I don't want to spill anyone's blood in someone else's throne room, so I'll be the bigger man and take a step back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take a step back, he stands back up, turns to Zanror. "Zanror. Open the door. Let us go "live our lives and you can run into whatever fires you want. The last thing we need is a civil "war this morning." What do you say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many people do you have with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns to you. "And you are?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We take 18 with us, west of the Fens. Let us be. It's not fair to drag them into this chaos."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: May I say something? I realize you want to go and protect your people, but even if you run, you guys will eventually come across a dragon that will kill all of your people. So what if we fight together? Because there's strength in numbers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should just let them leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check. With disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're a tiny gnome talking up to a very burly man who's--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, but I have Gnome Cunning-- charisma--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Go ahead and make your roll.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I have advantage on charismas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On charismas? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do! Gnome Cunning-- Advantage on all intelligence, wisdom, and charisma.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Saves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Saving throws.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yes, I didn't read the rest of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's not really going to help with that, unfortunately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, so persuasion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is persuasion.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck. Nine? Hah, he laughs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's interesting, Zanror, I walk into here and suddenly all the tiny people are talking for "you. Tress, let's go."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm a head taller. Talk to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I ain't got time for this shit anymore."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make time. Blade out. Those dragons are going to find you and me and everyone in this room, whether we fight them now or later. The only stupid thing we can do is separate ourselves from each other-- yeah, keep twitching, twitchy. I don't want to fight this dragon today either, but stupider than that is splitting this group of powerful motherfuckers apart. I'd rather walk away from here, I'd rather take everyone out of this city and build our strength and come back and hobble this beast, but the stupidest thing you could do right now is separate yourself from the Herd. You make yourself weaker, you don't have them to protect you while you're in the fields alone while that dragon belches shit on you from above. You're strong. These fucking guys are strong. We need to be smart. Your strength is shit compared to that dragon. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And your tiny people are going to do better?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our tiny people are pretty fucking powerful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We've already killed dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm getting pretty sick and tired of being called tiny. Listen, I don't want to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Killed dragons?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I pull out my necklace with the tooth on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lemme see that." He pulls it forward and looks it over. "Can buy that in any caravan that "passes through."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We killed a white dragon, motherfucker.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I spit at his feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi! Forget it, guys, why are we trying-- Why are we trying to convince this asshole to fight with us? Let's just let him leave, he's a coward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zanror, if he doesn't have your allegiance in this room, he will not have your allegiance on the battlefield, let them go. Only big men talk big words that only fail on the battlefield. He has nothing to represent any of his claims. Let him go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The only difference between you and us is that we want to actually kill this thing. You want to be a prick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zanror-- Zanror, it's not worth losing any of your men before we fight this dragon, just let them go. You're already losing 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because when we're done cutting that dragon down "we're going to come after you. Deserters. Or you can come to this fight with us. Yes, these "dragon-slayers, he who fell from the sky and cut the uncuttable down-- we will gloriously bathe in "the blood of that beast, take back the spoils that we fed it. You can do what you please. I have no "interest in lording over you." Looks about the rest of you. "I've got your arms at my back for "this. Aye?"

lines.name: TRAVIS, ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: Aye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll take our chances with the wild." Turns around and exits the room.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: As Ivon starts going out, I want to trip him. Stick my foot out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wars have been started over less.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It'll probably fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a strength check. Plus four to your roll, is what it'd be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (stumbling) Catches himself. Shoots you a look.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both exit out the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have fun melting in (trails off) acid-- and they're gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Door closes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry about that. So."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many do you have left? After they left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have more wounded, but they're not going to be "of use in this battle."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "25 strong people."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that include your wife? MATT:: "No, she's not--" And she turns around and goes, "I will fight in this. You are not going to "keep me from glory." He goes, "She will fight with us."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aye, she will. 25 strong we have. Injured are no good to us. Neither are the prisoners or hostages that were kept by this herd. You said you have made preparations. What sort of preparations do you have in mind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, the creature sleeps at the top of Gatshadow. We've acquired an ally in this city "that seems to know a secret byway to get to the side of that cavern. I figure that way we can go "ahead and take the fight to it where it sleeps, when it's not ready."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can't fly if it's stuck in a cave."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very true. Have you seen this cave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Only from afar, but we have some scouts that are making their way there right now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might report back with how-- the size of the cave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Should know soon."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I'm not mistaken, I recall hearing that no scouts that have been sent thus far have returned, is that correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is correct."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you have faith that these that you sent will?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's better than not."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have any interest in a tactical ambush?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm all ears. What have you got?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When's it due for its next pickup?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tomorrow morning, just after dawn."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait 24 hours, Pike and I can take time, and Scanlan, to heal some of your wounded, gain a couple more to the fight. We set a trap in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What kind of trap?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Something that explodes it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something big.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Something that traps it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something heavy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something, even in theory, that we could convince it to take back to its lair. If we still wanted to go with that, we could load the next parcel with something--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or someone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would three days be better than one, Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A month would be better than a week--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't have that. One thing dragons--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, three days would always be better than one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dragons and Kevdak shared one common trait: arrogance. In your previous dealings with this dragon, did it ever speak down to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Huh. That's the only way it knows how to speak. Fucking cold-minded beast."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can't wait to sever its head from its neck."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perhaps if we tame your lust for blood for a day, we can control all the variables that we have by setting this trap. If we go to that cave, aye, we will find war sooner, but we know less, and the reason you're the Thunderlord now is there is a better brain in that skull than there ever was in your father's. Let's use that to our advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check. Does anyone want to aid?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't need it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings) He doesn't need it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He might need it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes a moment. "We'll take your day. Set what you need. We'll go ahead and call the troops "off for the day. Heal our wounded. Let's make this such a majestic death for this terrible creature."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It would behoove you to release them so that they can join our side. Conversely, any other type of magical enhancements that you can use to arm against acid?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Acid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For any and all of your troops, it's definitely suggested.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll talk to our Speakers. They should be able to mount what they can. Acid, you say?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. We'll do that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll release the prisoners?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Would like one of you to at least go with them, but aye, we can do that. All right. Let's "begin our planning, for tomorrow we kill a dragon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We totally planned at dawn! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Episode title!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And on that note we're going to end tonight's episode. Pick this up next week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Planned at dawn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You totally did!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See? (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: At dawn, we plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have fun you guys, I'll be on a beach next week, but-- it's okay, I'll be, I'll try--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where're you going, brainiac?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To Hawaii.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can Skype you in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll see how much internet I can get on the island.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. Wait, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Barack is here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it open? All right guys, the Geek and Sundry open beta is next week!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be hosting, oh, Talking Heads, awesome new shows every day, a bunch of new shows we'll be trying out from up here on the channel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit! It's like pilot season.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, yeah. We'll be throwing a bunch of cool stuff up. Be every day at looks like 5:00 Pacific on twitch.tv/geekandsundry, where you are now most likely? But yeah. Come check out next week, bunch of new content thrown at this channel, come and give it your support, see if it's your speed, feedback, all the fun stuff. And also once again, thank you, Loot Crate, for being our sponsor.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been awesome to have an official sponsor for once.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like it's a real thing now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, it's weird. Yeah. So once again, you can go to www.lootcrate.com/criticalrole, put in "criticalrole" to get three dollars off your subscription, it's awesome, thank you for watching. Back next week and I think interesting things are going to happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. All right, guys. Is it Thursday yet? Good night.
